title: Skin Not working
body: Bought Battle Bunny Riven, every time i try to use it in a game it always reverts to my Redeemed Riven Skin, help please

replies.body:
There is a known bug for this in Teambuilder, experienced it myself :(

If this is happening but not in a Teambuilder queue, just contact support and pray to Anubis that it fixes?
